name: tiddlymemo
description: Incremental Learning program based on TiddlyWiki, deepening lifelong knowledge into mind

scripts.serve: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js . --listen
scripts.serve-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/zh-Hans/ --listen
scripts.serve-manual: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual/ --listen
scripts.serve-manual-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual-zh-Hans/ --listen
scripts.serve-empty: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/empty/ --listen
scripts.serve-empty-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/empty-zh-Hans/ --listen
scripts.build: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js . --output docs/ --build index
scripts.build-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/zh-Hans/ --output docs/ --build index
scripts.build-website-all: npm run build; npm run build-zh-Hans;
scripts.build-manual: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual/ --output docs/manual/ --build index
scripts.build-manual-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual-zh-Hans/ --output docs/manual/ --build index
scripts.build-manual-all: npm run build-manual; npm run build-manual-zh-Hans;
scripts.build-empty: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/empty/ --output docs/empty/ --build index
scripts.build-empty-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/empty-zh-Hans/ --output docs/empty/ --build index
scripts.build-empty-all: npm run build-empty; npm run build-empty-zh-Hans;
scripts.build-edition-all: npm run build-website-all; npm run build-manual-all; npm run build-empty-all;
scripts.build-library: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH='./plugins' TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki editions/manual/ --output docs/library --build library
scripts.build-all: npm run build-edition-all; npm run build-library;

author: oflg
